title.narrative: Community and Local Government Basic Social Services Project

description.narrative: The development objective of the project is to improve access to decentralized basic social services and social safety nets, and to strengthen the social protection system.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Decentralization and Local Government

condition.narrative: Schedule 2, section I.2. The Recipient shall no later than (6) six months after the Effective Date, recruit and maintain anexternal auditor, under terms of reference and with qualifications acceptable to the Association.

title.narrative: Public works schemes completed with satisfactory technical quality
Beneficiaries of social safety net programs - Female
Cash transfer payments made within 5 days of when they are due, according to the annual payment calendar
Communes with up to date financial audits with published action plans to correct any revealed deficiencies
Number of communes carrying out community driven investments with non-project financing
Beneficiaries of Safety Nets programs - Cash-for-work, food-for-work and public works (number)
Health facilities constructed, renovated, and/or equipped (number)
Beneficiaries of citizen engagement activities (Grassroots Management Training)
Students enrolled in schools constructed/rehabilitated under the project
Socio-economic infrastructure subprojects executed by communities through delegation of responsibility from communes
Number of additional classrooms built or rehabilitated at the primary level resulting from project interventions
Communities that have received Grassroots Management Training (GMT)
Communes showing improvement by the end of the project on the annual procurement audit
Women in leadership positions in community associations
Local government officials trained on procurement
Proportion of total safety nets transfers received by households ranked as poor or extreme poor by PMT
Communes having executed at least one subproject
Proportion of total cost of public works sub-projects allocated to wages
Beneficiaries of Safety Nets programs - Unconditional cash transfers (number)
Beneficiaries of social safety net programs
Households enrolled in National Social Registry
Percent of domestic revenues transferred by Government to communes through the FADeC
